data.text: Clean hotel with friendly and helpful staff. They helped me a lot for finding the best way to go to everywhere. So close to internet city metro station( you can open the hotel backyard door with your own room card and go straight to metro station). Delicious breakfast. Clean pool. Free shuttles to JBR Beach, outlet mall and somewhere else. The only thing I didnt like was the mattress and the quality of the coverlet. I found it a bit uncomfortable. Thank you so much for your host.
data.title: Perfect location, friendly staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Warm Greetings from dusitD2 Kenz Hotel Dubai!

We are so happy to hear you had a pleasing experience of staying with us at DusitD2 Kenz Hotel! It'd be our pleasure to have you stay with us again.

Regards,
Team DusitD2 Kenz Hotel
owner_response.author: Ahmed Reda

data.text:
We a group of six retirees from Brazil found the hotel to be conveniently located near Emirates Mall and Internet City Metro Station, with easy access to tourist attractions like Palm View and JBR Beach. The staff, including a sweet lady marra, were friendly, and the room service, as well as the assistance from concierge staff Zakir and Prem, was prompt and helpful. Twe will recommend the hotel to others and would consider booking it again in the future. 

Their interaction with Muhammad, the travel desk agent, added an extra layer to our experience. After initially contacting the hotel for tour information, Muhammad provided excellent service, crafting a tailored plan for our short stay in Dubai. Upon meeting him in person, we found him to be respectful, honest, and knowledgeable. Throughout our three-day tour, Muhammad guided us to various locations, answered our questions, and ensured we had a memorable experience in Dubai. Best wishes to Muhammad from Rio.
data.title: Perfect location for tourists

data.text: It was a good stay hotel is central located with easy access to metro, room was maintained well, will specifically mention Akash who ensured that guest requirements were taken into account during long stays. Only suggestion for the hotel is to check on WiFi especially on newer devices like iPhone 15 which was kind of irritant.
data.title: Good experience

data.text: Talk about exceeding expectations. This is a surprisingly good hotel right next to the Dubai Internet City metro station. It's neat and clean, with friendly, helpful staff. And there's a really good, value-for-money Thai restaurant on the first floor.
data.title: Excellent hotel option in Barsha Heights

data.text:
Perfect location, friendly staff, delicious food. Free Shuttle bus service offered by the hotel to few destinations. The staff is very welcoming, friendly snd helpful. 
There is a tourist agent st the hotel who can give you precious advices about Dubai attractions and you can book the attractions with him.
data.title: Perfect located, nice hotel with friendly staff
